name = "with multiple"
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"

[[requests]]
method = "GET"
url = "https://api.nowhere.com/v1/items/1234"
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"

[[requests]]
method = "GET"
url = "https://api.nowhere.com/v1/items/1234"
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"
noRedirect = true

[[requests]]
method = "GET"
url = "https://api.elsehwere.new/users/1"
responseFile = "response.200.json"
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"

[[requests]]
method = "GET"
url = "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/todos/1"
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"
[requests.headers]
Accept = ["application/json"]
Content-Type = ["application/json"]
User-Agent = ["go.followtheprocess.codes/zap test"]
X-Custom-Header = ["yes"]

[[requests]]
method = "DELETE"
url = "https://somewhere.org/api"
timeout = "15s"
connectionTimeout = "1s"

[[requests]]
method = "POST"
url = "https://somewhere.org/api/items/1"
body = [123, 34, 115, 116, 117, 102, 102, 34, 58, 34, 104, 101, 114, 101, 34, 125]
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"

[[requests]]
method = "POST"
url = "https://somewhere.org/api/items/1"
bodyFile = "a/file.txt"
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"

[[requests]]
method = "GET"
url = "https://api.elsehwere.new/users/1"
responseFile = "response.200.json"
timeout = "0s"
connectionTimeout = "0s"
